snippet.title: OMORI: REVERIE - CHAPTER 2 PRE RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
"A new adventure... written in the stars!"
 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
OMORI: REVERIE is a modded fangame project, set after the events of OMORI's good ending. In Chapter 2, the players find themselves back into a strange-yet-familiar location - Fallen World! Overcome new enemies, befriend new allies, and dig deep for the secrets about the changing nature of HEADSPACE! 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
Featuring:
- 3 entirely new party members, all with their completely unique skillsets and niches
- A new story following the events of the good ending, with Chapter 2 having ~60 minutes of playtime
- A totally revamped OTHERWORLD, with new bosses and enemies.
- 2 difficulty modes, normal and hard

You can download Chapter 2 now! https://mods.one/mod/reverie

Trailer by Ludie (@Jaldrah)
Trailer song by Casac
